mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply(replyno, itemsno, memberno, content, passwd, rdate) VALUES(reply_seq.nextval, #{itemsno}, #{memberno}, #{content}, #{passwd}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT replyno, itemsno, memberno, content, passwd, rdate FROM reply ORDER BY replyno DESC
SELECT m.id, r.replyno, r.itemsno, r.memberno, r.content, r.passwd, r.rdate FROM member m, reply r WHERE m.memberno = r.memberno ORDER BY r.replyno DESC
SELECT m.id, r.replyno, r.itemsno, r.memberno, r.content, r.passwd, r.rdate FROM member m, reply r WHERE (m.memberno = r.memberno) AND r.itemsno=#{itemsno} ORDER BY r.replyno DESC

SELECT id, replyno, itemsno, memberno, content, passwd, rdate, r FROM ( SELECT id, replyno, itemsno, memberno, content, passwd, rdate, rownum as r FROM ( SELECT m.id, r.replyno, r.itemsno, r.memberno, r.content, r.passwd, r.rdate FROM member m, reply r WHERE (m.memberno = r.memberno) AND r.itemsno= ${itemsno} ORDER BY r.replyno DESC ) ) WHERE r <= 1000
